That knight will not save white's black bishop from the d5 pawn.
That pawn may cost the white bishop, since the queen is behind it.
moves.17... Nf6 18. Qg5 Rxh7 19. g3 d5 20. Nd2: I like Rd1 here better.  Or Nf4 to protect the night.
moves.27... a4 28. Nd4 Nf6 29. Rd6: Oh, NxN+ is way better.  Bishop can't take it because discovered check by the rook.  QxN would be followed by QxQ.  Ke8 ends in mate by white.  Kc8 lets white save the g6 night.
moves.29... Ne8 30. Nxb5: Oh, oh, Ne6+ yields the black queen!
Protecting the knight over the rook?  Ne7+ at least gives white black's black bishop (QxB).
